text:
Khullam Khulla: When Sanjay Dutt wanted to beat up Rishi Kapoor bollywood Updated: Feb 03, 2017 11:04 IST Hindustan Times, New Delhi Rshi Kapoor’s biography, Khullam Khulla, is full of revelations. 
It’s ironic that Ranbir Kapoor is all set to play the title role in a biopic based on Sanjay Dutt, considering that the Khalnayak star once wanted to beat up his father — veteran actor Rishi Kapoor. Read more Regina Cassandra excited to work with Amitabh Bachchan in Aankhen 2 
Strange as it may sound, this is exactly what’s written in Rishi’s biography ‘Khullam Khulla’. 
“It’s true. Sanju was having an affair with Tina Munim at the time, and he thought that Chintu (as Rishi is referred to by his friends) was having one with her too. Sanju and I were like brothers, and he told me one day, ‘We have to go to Chintu’s house and beat him up’. We went to do that, but his fiancée Neetuji managed to convince us that Chintu was not in any such relationship. So we left,” discloses fellow actor Gulshan Grover candidly. 
Back then, Rishi was yet to marry Neetu Singh. Read more
